input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product keywords and the product name below. You are a fantastic copywriter so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
Ingersoll-Rand IRTC2475F13GH Two-Stage Gas-Powered Air Compressor

Product keywords:
Durable cast iron for 100% continuous-duty application
Precision-engineered components for over 15,000 hours of trouble-free use
Honda engine
Extended 2-year warranty when used with Ingersoll Rand's All season select synthetic lubricant
175 psi maximum operating pressure
Extended pump life
100pct duty cycle
Warranty 1-year warranty on material and workmanship
Featuring truck-bed mounting
Type 30 units include electronic ignition, idle engine control, a 30-gallon ASME receiver, an OSHA-approved, fully enclosed belt guard, and a weather-resistant powder-coat paint finish
input_text.Response A: The Ingersoll-Rand IRTC2475F13GH Two-Stage Gas-Powered Air Compressor is a durable, precision-engineered machine that features a Honda engine and cast iron components for long life. Its truck-bed mounting and 100% continuous-duty application make it perfect for any work site. With an extended 2-year warranty when used with Ingersoll Rand's All season select synthetic lubricant, this compressor is built to last.
input_text.Response B: The Ingersoll-Rand IRTC2475F13GH Two-Stage Gas-Powered Air Compressor is an excellent choice for a durable, high-quality compressor with a wide range of applications.  This compressor features a heavy-duty cast iron construction for superior durability and performance, as well as precision-engineered components for reliable operation and extended pump life.  The compressor also includes a Honda engine for increased power and performance, as well as an extended 2-year warranty when used with Ingersoll Rand's All season select synthetic lubricant.  This compressor has a maximum operating pressure of 175 psi and features a 100% duty cycle for continuous operation, making it ideal for a wide range of applications including manufacturing, construction, automotive, and more.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.feedback: Second submission has some repetitive words
